issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Every SDK 8+ swift module has a "ti.swiftsupport" hook to enable Swift linking. It should be insice the SDK, so duplicate hook warnings can be resolved:

{code}
[WARN]  Hook ID: ti.swiftsupport
[WARN]    Loaded: /Users/user/Documents/dev/myapp/myapp-titanium/modules/iphone/ti.documentpicker/xxx/hooks/ti.swiftsupport.js
[WARN]    Didn't load: /Users/user/Documents/dev/myapp/myapp-titanium/modules/iphone/ti.applesignin/xxx/hooks/ti.swiftsupport.js
[WARN]    Didn't load: /Users/user/Documents/dev/myapp/myapp-titanium/modules/iphone/ti.editor/xxx/hooks/ti.swiftsupport.js
[WARN]    Didn't load: /Users/user/Documents/dev/myapp/myapp-titanium/modules/iphone/ti.pusher/xxx/hooks/ti.swiftsupport.js
[WARN]    Didn't load: /Users/user/Documents/dev/myapp/myapp-titanium/modules/iphone/ti.imagepicker/xxx/hooks/ti.swiftsupport.js
[WARN]    Didn't load: /Users/user/Documents/dev/myapp/myapp-titanium/modules/iphone/ti.notificationbanner/xxx/hooks/ti.swiftsupport.js
{code}
